Table P-13.  Marital Status--All Races 18 Years Old and Over by Median Income and Sex:  1974 to 2016
(People 18 years old and over as of March of the following year.  Income in current and 2016 CPI-U-RS adjusted dollars (28)).  NOTE:  The category 'Married, Total' is not available before 1987.

Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Current Population Survey, Annual Social and Economic Supplements.  For information on confidentiality protection, sampling error, nonsampling error, and definitions, see //www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/cps/techdocs/cpsmar17.pdf
